about_the_game:
Drift City is an Open World Driving Drifting Sim with Deep Car Customization such as Speed, Suspension, different driving system and styles and much more which you can read down below. There are 8 cars that can be unlocked for the Early Access and we will add at least 20 cars to the game. It has 6 different cameras/views to see the car and play. There are also Slowmotion and Nitro for all cars available. It has a minimap so you can see where you go and what you will face and amazing music that can be muted if you wish. More in detail down below.

Customization is not available in the demo version please buy the full version.















Suspension
=========

Front Suspension Spring Force
Front Suspension Spring Damp
Rear Suspension Spring Force
Rear Suspension Spring Damp
Front Camber
Rear Camber
Front Suspension
Rear Suspension

Electronic Systems
===============

ABS, ESP, TCS, SH

Driving Styles
===========

Simulator, Racing, Drift, Semi Arcade, Fun

Colors
=====

Headlight Colors, Wheel Smoke Colors

Driving Customization
=================

Maximum Speed Maximum Brake Maximum Torque, Turbo, Exhaust Flame, Rev Limiter, Auto Transmission RWD FWD ADW, Clutch Threshold, Gear Shifting Threshold.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4160 or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 640 or Radeon HD 5450, RAM 2GB

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
